name: PTSD Fishing
description:
In this game, you play as a cat that experiences PTSD during fishing.

Controls:

  • WASD to move up, left, right, down
  • Hold SPACE to charge a fishing rod
  • Release SPACE to cast the fishing rod
  • Also, SPACE when fish bites

Made by:

  • KuKuRammus - programming - https://twitter.com/KuKuRammus
  • SunderB1rd - art - https://twitter.com/sunderB1rd
